website_summaries.verdict: Experience Apple CarPlay, streaming music apps, maps, navigation, and hands-free control with this double DIN car stereo.
pros: Versatile and affordable option for iPhone users
Control everything with your existing steering wheel controls
Great for hands-free voice control and navigation
cons: Has no CD or DVD playback functionality

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Headache
customer_reviews.text: This system was purchased for a 2015 Nissan Sentra. Once installed, the unit wouldn't work properly with an iPhone 7 and the rear back up camera only worked when the camera function was selected. My husband spent hours on the phone with tech support, who verified that all the wires were properly routed. The audio system is being returned for a refund, and we are headed to eat Buy to find a suitable replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a CarPlay head unit at a good price, look no further.
customer_reviews.text: If you need a solid CarPlay unit at a good price, this is the one for you. The touchscreen is capacitive when competitors at this price are using cheaper resistive screens. The interface is pleasing and easy to navigate. As of early 2018, this is the best CarPlay unit on the market for its segment. Bluetooth mic quality is as good as OEM setups I have used on other cars. Setup is easy and the unit comes with all the necessary adapters including remote power for a backup camera which is a nice feature. If you have an older car and want to spruce it up a bit, buy this radio without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Johnson Curl

customer_reviews.title: HUGE Upgrade to existing system
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my 2006 Ford Van including the microphone and a backup camera. This is a HUGE upgrade and works almost flawlessly. The only caveat is that is is bright at night. That aside, I HIGHLY recommend this especially if you have an iPhone. Apple CarPlay is pretty spot on. Messages are super easy via voice as it reads to you and you can dictate. Everything else is very cool and your Apple Music integration is flawless. Other good additions are Whats App, navigation is cool and podcast work well also. Well done & easy to install!!
customer_reviews.author: [R]

customer_reviews.title: but a physical volume button would be better. I installed it myself
customer_reviews.text: Would require an additional fit part to hold in place, but it is THE product I am looking for. I don’t need that awkward GPS in stereo, whine anyone’s phone can do it. Using it is convenient enough, but a physical volume button would be better. I installed it myself, and it’s my first time doing this kind of work. It has a built in amplifier, which is beyond my expectations. It’s price and have Apple CarPlay are the reason I chose it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L.

customer_reviews.title: The radio looks and works great. Was pretty easy to install too
customer_reviews.text: The radio looks and works great. Was pretty easy to install too. ApplePlay works ok, however if you connect the phone to the radio prior to starting the car most of the times the mic does not work. Very annoying at times, restarting the car with the phone unplugged fixes the issue, but is very agrevating. Was hoping I could somehow update the firmware but was not able to find steps for how to do that easily.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gluzman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice radio. Simple design
customer_reviews.text: Very nice radio. Simple design! It was a perfect gift for my father as it was not too complicated for him to learn to operate. Seamless design and software. Apple car play runs quick and smoothly on this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Minjarez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful display, fast response on touch screen
customer_reviews.text: Unit is very clean. Beautiful display, fast response on touch screen. Does NOT work with CarPlay WIRELESSLY. Will work with CarPlay wired. Bluetooth functionality is decent. All told, this unit is a whole lotta bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: 609Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, with the right speakers it will put out plenty of sound. More settings then you’ll ever need. Customizable to your taste of sound. Doesn’t lag at all. Overall great radio for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great stereo for the money! CarPlay works perfectly, wish it had a knob for volume would be my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L. White

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: the touch and carplay is amazing fastest touch i have seen and the mic omg it’s don’t have lag
customer_reviews.author: SonObaid

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work when it comes to calling and receiving calls
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t matter if it’s using CarPlay or Bluetooth I can only listen to music but I can’t recorded any calls and no one is able to listen to me. I have reset to factory settings to fix it. I have done that twice already. It really sucks because I really wanted to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Javier Coka

customer_reviews.title: so far so good, only had it in a day
customer_reviews.text: so far so good, only had it in a day. I installed it in an 03 Dodge Ram 2500, make sure you get the antenna adapter and the correct wiring harness. Update: it's been great, radio channels come in clearer and everything works as expected. The packaging by Amazon was 1 star, they put the stereo box in a box with no padding or anything to take up space, allowing the stereo to slide around inside.
customer_reviews.author: Crash

customer_reviews.title: I love this unit and would buy it again and
customer_reviews.text: Dont spend more for a bigger name brand, This unit works seamlessly and the carplay is fast and responsive. I love this unit and would buy it again and again
customer_reviews.author: Antonino B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stereo for the money. Good interface, easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua G.

customer_reviews.title: BVCP9675 installed in 2013 Wrangler JKU
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this buy! Navigation system for $270! Just can’t beat that. The CarPlay works like a dream! Downloaded music to a flash drive and connected to the usb connection. Ran an extension usb to my glove box so it can be easily accessed. Fit great in my Jeep. Looks very clean and functions great! I was skeptical at some of the reviews but glad I made the purchase. Had it in my Jeep for 3 months now and zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Waldrop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect upgrade for an older vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: We picked up this deck to update the radio/CD player in our 2004 Sequoia. Even though the advertisements seemed to focus on its Apple CarPlay functionality, we don't have iPhones and were somewhat concerned that it would not be compatible to Android devices. We needn't have worried. I was easily able to connect the deck to my smart phone via Bluetooth. The AM/FM radio also works great and I can plug my iPod into a USB port in the glove box so that it charges while it plays. The sound is fine for what we need and it can easily be adjusted to focus the volume to different spots in the vehicle. Bottom line: This serves our needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Great system. I had to do a dash modification ...
customer_reviews.text: Great system. I had to do a dash modification for my own vehicle but it came with a template to help with that. I was able to make it work with an older (1993) GMC Suburban. It had great sound and the apple play for the car worked great. The bluetooth worked well too. I was able to make phone calls easily through the voice commands and the sound quality was really good even with the old speakers in my car. I didn't have to buy any additional cabling or adapters, it came with everything that was needed. All i had to do was some minor soldering before installing the system.
customer_reviews.author: Nero Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Stereo
customer_reviews.text: This unit works very well. Sound quality is very good and Apple CarPlay worked great. It was fairly easy to install and I had no problems getting it working. All in all I am very satisfied with it. It does not come with a CD player. That worried me at first but after using the Bluetooth and Apple CarPlay features with my iPhone 7 I have concluded CDs are a thing of the past at least for the car. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, Sleek, Easily Installed
customer_reviews.text: I see there are plenty of excellent, detailed reviews posted. Many of the best are by do-it-yourself hobbyists who really know their stuff. Therefore, I will express my thoughts from a layman’s standpoint. In other words, did it install easily? Yes. Does it live up to its promise? Yes. Am I happy with it? Yes. Five stars out of five.
customer_reviews.author: C Wm (Andy) Anderson

customer_reviews.title: We really loved this for the iphone interface to make it easier ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for daughter's 2014 Jeep Patriot. Works really well for her needs. We really loved this for the iphone interface to make it easier to use. Her friend installed this for her, has installed many stereos and found it easy to do. Not sure about overall sound quality but for her use, along with standard jeep speakers, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: banana wind

customer_reviews.title: Apple CarPlay is Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound quality, easy to use interface, and Apple CarPlay make this one a winner. I was especially pleased with the microphone clarity.
customer_reviews.author: The Three Woods

customer_reviews.title: Love this screen more than anything
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful screen and great stereo upgrade. Very happy! Love bose
customer_reviews.author: Natalie V. Galasso

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: If i didn’t have to put a star i wouldn’t. I got this radio and had it professionally installed and two weeks later the Apple car play stops working the iPod hook up won’t work. Only think that works anymore is the fm radio. I would not get this radio. Wasn’t worth the money for it to stop working not even a month after being installed. Wish I had the option to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Fields

customer_reviews.title: Erractic Sound Quality and Bluetooth Connection
customer_reviews.text: This Boss Audio Systems BVCP9675 comes with clear instruction to install. It's feature rich with backup camera connection and Apple Carplay. It would be nice if it comes with Android Auto. However, the radio reception is poor and the sound quality is erratic and hard to adjust. Bluetooth becomes unstable after a few days of use. Without a stable Bluetooth connection, Apple Carplay cannot be fully enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Mat633

product_meta.title: BOSS Audio Systems BVCP9675 Double Din, Apple CarPlay, Bluetooth, MP3 USB - - no CD DVD AM FM Receiver, 6.75 Inch Capacitive Touchscreen
product_meta.description: Apple car play is the smarter, safer way to use iPhone in your car. Apple car play seamlessly integrates your iPhone with the car’s Built-in display and controls. Now you can make phone calls, access your music, send and receive messages, get directions, and more while you stay focused on the road.
feature_bullets: Apple CarPlay seamlessly integrates your iPhone with the car’s built-in display and controls. Now you can make phone calls, access your music, send and receive messages, get directions, and more while you stay focused on the road.
Bluetooth: make and receive calls and play and control music and apps like Spotify / Pandora wirelessly
Plays Bluetooth / USB / MP3 / WMA / AM/FM / Digital Media From Smartphones (No CD / DVD Player)
Compatible With Audio Out From Smartphones And MP3 Players
Inputs: USB, AUX, Rear Camera, Steering Wheel Control
Outputs: Front, Rear & Sub Pre amp
USB Charging, Multi Color Illumination Options, RDBS (Radio Data Broadcasting System) Tuner, Balance / Fader / Bass / Treble And Pre-Set Built-In EQ

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars39 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: BVCP9675, Instruction Manual, Remote Control, Power Harness
